mapper.update: update t_carpark set carparkName = #{carparkname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carparkAddress = #{carparkaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entryUser = #{entryuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entryTime = #{entrytime,jdbcType=DATE}, developers = #{developers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, management = #{management,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `operator` = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, propert = #{propert,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, equipment = #{equipment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carparkNature = #{carparknature,jdbcType=INTEGER}, carparkType = #{carparktype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, propertyYears = #{propertyyears,jdbcType=INTEGER}, loanYears = #{loanyears,jdbcType=INTEGER}, carparkRank = #{carparkrank,jdbcType=TINYINT}, carparkTotal = #{carparktotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, carparkTotalLoan = #{carparktotalloan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, buildingId = #{buildingid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where carparkId = #{carparkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select carparkId, carparkName, carparkAddress, entryUser, entryTime, developers, management, `operator`, propert, equipment, carparkNature, carparkType, propertyYears, loanYears, carparkRank, carparkTotal, carparkTotalLoan, buildingId from t_carpark where carparkId = #{carparkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
